channel.title: SFM DLC Pack
channel.description: So, I may be dumb, but... Where is the Black Mesa pack for Source Filmmaker? I tried finding it in the SFM workshop and on the profiles of the devs, but to no avail. Can someone point me in the right direction with a link to the pack or keywords to search on the workshop? I will love you 5ever if you do.

item.title: SFM DLC Pack
item.dc:creator: Skuros
item.description:
It should be in the section for DLC on the page for SFM in your library.

Read full topic
